string-array.name: main_buttons_note
string-array.item: Author of this app does not assume resposibility for usage of the third-party images. Using this app, the user is obliged to adhere to the law and respect the copyright.
In the process, the hints will appear. Press next or selected element to continue.
In this window you are working with the image. Main tools are hidden behind three buttons.
There you open the folders, view the images etc. Pressing and holding an element of gallery opens the additional actions. Access to the multimedia is required for it to work.

string-array.name: draw_main_buttons_note
string-array.item: Add an image or begin a new project. If you want to combine images then work from here.
Tools for drawing editing. Some of them are active only under certain conditions.
Save or share an image from the studio here.

string-array.name: draw_add_note
string-array.item: Open a photo taken from the camera. Access to the camera is required for it to work.
Get an image from the collection.

string-array.name: draw_save_note
string-array.item: Share the image from the studio.
Save the image in certain location. System explorer will appear. In case of absence of the required storage check out menu of the explorer, it might be hidden.
Save the image in previous location.

string-array.name: draw_tools_note
string-array.item: Settings window for the tools. Always active.
Zoom. You can switch one of the three modes pressing on this button. Active when an image is present in the studio.
Move the image on the screen. Active when an image is present in the studio.
Select the area and cut it pressing there. Tags along the outline and in the center let you to adjust the selection. Active when an image is present in the studio.
Rotation, distortion. Switch between them is right there. Last mode resets everything. Active when an image is present in the studio.
Insert the text. Press here again, the settings window for the text will appear. Active when an image is present in the studio.
Fill by color, fill inside the outlined area. Active when there is an image in the studio.
Solid eraser and with gradients. Switch them here. Active when an image is present in the studio.
Brush, three modes and stain. Active when an image is present in the studio.
Copy the colour from the drawing. Previous tool remains active. Active when an image is present in the studio.
Outline of the drawing. Useful when working with transparent canvas. When working with two, the colours of the outlines are different. Active when an image is present in the studio.
Deletes the project with all history. Active when an image is present in the studio.
Allows some of the tools affect both images. Active when an additional image is present.
Swapping the places of main and upper images. Active when an additional image is present.
Combine two images into one. Upper crops along the outline of the main. Active when an additional image is present.
Delete upper image. Active when an additional image is present.

string-array.name: collect_note
string-array.item: Add a folder in gallery. System explorer will appear. Choose a folder and if it has the images, then it will be added. In case of absence of the required storage check out menu of the explorer, it might be hidden.

string-array.name: collect_root_menu_note
string-array.item: Additional settings mode. Applicable to one folder. Leave it by pressing this button.
Share the contents of this folder.

string-array.name: collect_adapt_menu_note
string-array.item: Additional settings mode. Applicable to more than one images. Leave it by pressing this button.

string-array.name: addlyr_note
string-array.item: Big size of the image can affect the stability of the app. Here you can resize it.
Image inversion. To cancel, click here.
Switch to black and white mode. To cancel, click here.
Send the image to the studio.
Return to the source of the image.

string-array.name: review_note
string-array.item: Image view with the option to leaf through. With this button you can share it.
Send to the edit window and then open in the studio. Important! Opening the image from here begins a new project.

string-array.name: creator_note
string-array.item: Blank canvas mode. Open canvas in editor to send it to the studio.
Open colour selector. Press on center to exit.

string-array.name: addlyr_collect_note
string-array.item: Gallery contains folders with images. Open them in the studio. They will be added to the existing project. If studio already has an additional image then it will be replaced.

string-array.name: addlyr_cam_note
string-array.item: Take a picture and open it in the editor.

string-array.name: prop_note
string-array.item: Shows the brush. Its size and the colour.
Eraser, width and level of erasing.
Size and colour of the text.
Set the colour of the brush and text.
Set the transparency level of the selected colour.
Set the width of the brush, eraser and size of the text.

string-array.name: edit_text_note
string-array.item: Used font. Сlick to view list.
Choose solid font or its outline.
Adjust the angle of the font.
Set the required inclination of the font.

string-array.name: edit_text_fonts_note
string-array.item: Add downloaded font. Font is a file with "ttf" or "otf" extension.
